verses.verse: ה֚וֹי <WH1945> Woe אֲרִיאֵ֣ל <WH740> to Ariel אֲרִיאֵ֔ל <WH740> to Ariel קִרְיַ֖ת <WH7151> the city חָנָ֣ה <WH2583> dwelt דָוִ֑ד <WH1732> [where] David סְפ֥וּ <WH5595> add שָׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> ye year עַל־ <WH5921> unto שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> to year חַגִּ֥ים <WH2282> sacrifices יִנְקֹֽפוּ׃ <WH5362> let them kill

וַהֲצִיק֖וֹתִי <WH6693> Yet I will distress לַֽאֲרִיאֵ֑ל <WH740> Ariel וְהָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> become תַֽאֲנִיָּה֙ <WH8386> and there shall be heaviness וַֽאֲנִיָּ֔ה <WH592> and sorrow וְהָ֥יְתָה <WH1961> become לִּ֖י כַּאֲרִיאֵֽל׃ <WH740> and it shall be unto me as Ariel

וְחָנִ֥יתִי <WH2583> And I will camp כַדּ֖וּר <WH1754> against thee round about עָלָ֑יִךְ <WH5921> against וְצַרְתִּ֤י <WH6696> and will lay siege עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5921> against מֻצָּ֔ב <WH4674> against thee with a mount וַהֲקִֽימֹתִ֥י <WH6965> and I will raise עָלַ֖יִךְ <WH5921> against מְצֻרֹֽת׃ <WH4694> forts

וְשָׁפַלְתְּ֙ <WH8213> And thou shalt be brought down מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the ground תְּדַבֵּ֔רִי <WH1696> [and] shalt speak וּמֵֽעָפָ֖ר <WH6083> out of the dust תִּשַּׁ֣ח <WH7817> shall be low אִמְרָתֵ֑ךְ <WH565> and thy speech וְֽ֠הָיָה <WH1961> become כְּא֤וֹב <WH178> shall be as of one that hath a familiar spirit מֵאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> out of the ground קוֹלֵ֔ךְ <WH6963> and thy voice וּמֵעָפָ֖ר <WH6083> out of the dust אִמְרָתֵ֥ךְ <WH565> and thy speech תְּצַפְצֵֽף׃ <WH6850> shall whisper

וְהָיָ֛ה <WH1961> will become כְּאָבָ֥ק <WH80> dust דַּ֖ק <WH1851> shall be like small הֲמ֣וֹן <WH1995> Moreover the multitude זָרָ֑יִךְ <WH2114> of thy strangers וּכְמֹ֤ץ <WH4671> [shall be] as chaff עֹבֵר֙ <WH5674> that passeth away הֲמ֣וֹן <WH1995> and the multitude עָֽרִיצִ֔ים <WH6184> of the terrible ones וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> will happen לְפֶ֥תַע <WH6621> yea it shall be at an instant פִּתְאֹֽם׃ <WH6597> suddenly

מֵעִ֨ם <WH5973> From יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> of hosts תִּפָּקֵ֔ד <WH6485> Thou shalt be visited בְּרַ֥עַם <WH7482> with thunder וּבְרַ֖עַשׁ <WH7494> and with earthquake וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> noise גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> and great סוּפָה֙ <WH5492> with storm וּסְעָרָ֔ה <WH5591> and tempest וְלַ֖הַב <WH3851> and the flame אֵ֥שׁ <WH784> fire אוֹכֵלָֽה׃ <WH398> of devouring

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become כַּֽחֲלוֹם֙ <WH2472> her shall be as a dream חֲז֣וֹן <WH2377> vision לַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> of a night הֲמוֹן֙ <WH1995> And the multitude כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of all the nations הַצֹּבְאִ֖ים <WH6633> that fight עַל־ <WH5921> against אֲרִיאֵ֑ל <WH740> against Ariel וְכָל־ <WH3605> all צֹבֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH6633> war וּמְצֹ֣דָתָ֔הּ <WH4685> against her and her munition וְהַמְּצִיקִ֖ים <WH6693> and that distress לָֽהּ׃

וְהָיָ֡ה <WH1961> become כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> or as when יַחֲלֹ֨ם <WH2492> [man] dreameth הָרָעֵ֜ב <WH7457> It shall even be as when an hungry וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold אוֹכֵ֗ל <WH398> and behold he eateth וְהֵקִיץ֮ <WH6974> but he awaketh וְרֵיקָ֣ה <WH7386> is empty נַפְשׁוֹ֒ <WH5315> and his soul וְכַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after יַחֲלֹ֤ם <WH2492> dreameth הַצָּמֵא֙ <WH6771> a thirsty man וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold שֹׁתֶ֔ה <WH8354> and behold he drinketh וְהֵקִיץ֙ <WH6974> but he awaketh וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> behold עָיֵ֔ף <WH5889> and behold [he is] faint וְנַפְשׁ֖וֹ <WH5315> and his soul שׁוֹקֵקָ֑ה <WH8264> hath appetite כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> Thus יִֽהְיֶ֗ה <WH1961> become הֲמוֹן֙ <WH1995> so shall the multitude כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of all the nations הַצֹּבְאִ֖ים <WH6633> be that fight עַל־ <WH5921> against הַ֥ר <WH2022> against mount צִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> Zion ס

הִתְמַהְמְה֣וּ <WH4102> Stay וּתְמָ֔הוּ <WH8539> yourselves and wonder הִשְׁתַּֽעַשְׁע֖וּ <WH8173> cry ye out וָשֹׁ֑עוּ <WH8173> and cry שָֽׁכְר֣וּ <WH7937> they are drunken וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not יַ֔יִן <WH3196> but not with wine נָע֖וּ <WH5128> they stagger וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not שֵׁכָֽר׃ <WH7941> but not with strong drink

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָסַ֨ךְ <WH5258> hath poured out עֲלֵיכֶ֤ם <WH5921> over יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> upon you the spirit תַּרְדֵּמָ֔ה <WH8639> of deep sleep וַיְעַצֵּ֖ם <WH6105> and hath closed אֶת־ <WH853> עֵֽינֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5869> your eyes אֶת־ <WH853> הַנְּבִיאִ֛ים <WH5030> the prophets וְאֶת־ <WH853> רָאשֵׁיכֶ֥ם <WH7218> and your rulers הַחֹזִ֖ים <WH2374> the seers כִּסָּֽה׃ <WH3680> hath he covered

וַתְּהִ֨י <WH1961> become לָכֶ֜ם חָז֣וּת <WH2380> And the vision הַכֹּ֗ל <WH3605> the entire כְּדִבְרֵי֮ <WH1697> of all is become unto you as the words הַסֵּ֣פֶר <WH5612> of a book הֶֽחָתוּם֒ <WH2856> that is sealed אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> which יִתְּנ֣וּ <WH5414> which [men] deliver אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹדֵ֥עַ <WH3045> to one that is learned [הַסֵּפֶר כ] (סֵ֛פֶר <WH5612> book ק) לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> saying קְרָ֣א <WH7121> Read נָא־ <WH4994> Please זֶ֑ה <WH2088> this וְאָמַר֙ <WH559> this I pray thee and he saith לֹ֣א <WH3808> not אוּכַ֔ל <WH3201> I cannot כִּ֥י <WH3588> for חָת֖וּם <WH2856> for it [is] sealed הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְנִתַּ֣ן <WH5414> is delivered הַסֵּ֗פֶר <WH5612> And the book עַל֩ <WH5921> unto אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> cannot יָדַ֥ע <WH3045> I am not learned סֵ֛פֶר <WH5612> the book לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> saying קְרָ֣א <WH7121> Read נָא־ <WH4994> Please זֶ֑ה <WH2088> this וְאָמַ֕ר <WH559> this I pray thee and he saith לֹ֥א <WH3808> cannot יָדַ֖עְתִּי <WH3045> acknowledge סֵֽפֶר׃ <WH5612> the book ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֲדֹנָ֗י <WH136> Wherefore the Lord יַ֚עַן <WH3282> Forasmuch כִּ֤י <WH3588> for נִגַּשׁ֙ <WH5066> draw near הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> as this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this בְּפִ֤יו <WH6310> [me] with their mouth וּבִשְׂפָתָיו֙ <WH8193> and with their lips כִּבְּד֔וּנִי <WH3513> do honour וְלִבּ֖וֹ <WH3820> their heart רִחַ֣ק <WH7368> far מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> at וַתְּהִ֤י <WH1961> consists יִרְאָתָם֙ <WH3373> afraid אֹתִ֔י <WH853> מִצְוַ֥ת <WH4687> by the precept אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> he מְלֻמָּדָֽה׃ <WH3925> toward me is taught

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> behold יוֹסִ֛ף <WH3254> Therefore behold I will proceed לְהַפְלִ֥יא <WH6381> to do a marvellous work אֶת־ <WH854> for הָֽעָם־ <WH5971> among this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this הַפְלֵ֣א <WH6381> [even] a marvellous work וָפֶ֑לֶא <WH6382> and a wonder וְאָֽבְדָה֙ <WH6> [men] shall perish חָכְמַ֣ת <WH2451> for the wisdom חֲכָמָ֔יו <WH2450> of their wise וּבִינַ֥ת <WH998> and the understanding נְבֹנָ֖יו <WH995> of their prudent תִּסְתַּתָּֽר׃ <WH5641> [men] shall be hid ס

ה֛וֹי <WH1945> Woe הַמַּעֲמִיקִ֥ים <WH6009> unto them that seek deep מֵֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> from the LORD לַסְתִּ֣ר <WH5641> to hide עֵצָ֑ה <WH6098> their counsel וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> are in בְמַחְשָׁךְ֙ <WH4285> are in the dark מַֽעֲשֵׂיהֶ֔ם <WH4639> and their works וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <WH559> and they say מִ֥י <WH4310> Who רֹאֵ֖נוּ <WH7200> Who seeth וּמִ֥י <WH4310> Who יוֹדְעֵֽנוּ׃ <WH3045> us? and who knoweth

הַ֨פְכְּכֶ֔ם <WH2017> Surely your turning of things upside down אִם־ <WH518> lo כְּחֹ֥מֶר <WH2563> clay הַיֹּצֵ֖ר <WH3335> as the potter's יֵֽחָשֵׁ֑ב <WH2803> shall be esteemed כִּֽי־ <WH3588> would יֹאמַ֨ר <WH559> say מַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <WH4639> for shall the work לְעֹשֵׂ֙הוּ֙ <WH6213> of him that made לֹ֣א <WH3808> has no עָשָׂ֔נִי <WH6213> it He made וְיֵ֛צֶר <WH3336> me not? or shall the thing framed אָמַ֥ר <WH559> say לְיוֹצְר֖וֹ <WH3335> of him that framed לֹ֥א <WH3808> has no הֵבִֽין׃ <WH995> it He had no understanding

הֲלוֹא־ <WH3808> not עוֹד֙ <WH5750> yet מְעַ֣ט <WH4592> little while מִזְעָ֔ר <WH4213> [Is] it not yet a very וְשָׁ֥ב <WH7725> shall be turned לְבָנ֖וֹן <WH3844> and Lebanon לַכַּרְמֶ֑ל <WH3759> into a fruitful field וְהַכַּרְמֶ֖ל <WH3759> and the fruitful field לַיַּ֥עַר <WH3293> comb יֵחָשֵֽׁב׃ <WH2803> shall be esteemed

וְשָׁמְע֧וּ <WH8085> hear בַיּוֹם־ <WH3117> And in that day הַה֛וּא <WH1931> he הַחֵרְשִׁ֖ים <WH2795> shall the deaf דִּבְרֵי־ <WH1697> the words סֵ֑פֶר <WH5612> of the book וּמֵאֹ֣פֶל <WH652> out of obscurity וּמֵחֹ֔שֶׁךְ <WH2822> and out of darkness עֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> and the eyes עִוְרִ֖ים <WH5787> of the blind תִּרְאֶֽינָה׃ <WH7200> shall see

וְיָסְפ֧וּ <WH3254> also shall increase עֲנָוִ֛ים <WH6035> The meek בַּֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> in the LORD שִׂמְחָ֑ה <WH8057> [their] joy וְאֶבְיוֹנֵ֣י <WH34> and the poor אָדָ֔ם <WH120> among men בִּקְד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> in the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel יָגִֽילוּ׃ <WH1523> shall rejoice

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָפֵ֥ס <WH656> is brought to nought עָרִ֖יץ <WH6184> For the terrible one וְכָ֣לָה <WH3615> is consumed לֵ֑ץ <WH3887> and the scorner וְנִכְרְת֖וּ <WH3772> are cut off כָּל־ <WH3605> all שֹׁ֥קְדֵי <WH8245> and all that watch אָֽוֶן׃ <WH205> for iniquity

מַחֲטִיאֵ֤י <WH2398> an offender אָדָם֙ <WH120> That make a man בְּדָבָ֔ר <WH1697> for a word וְלַמּוֹכִ֥יחַ <WH3198> for him that reproveth בַּשַּׁ֖עַר <WH8179> in the gate יְקֹשׁ֑וּן <WH6983> and lay a snare וַיַּטּ֥וּ <WH5186> and turn aside בַתֹּ֖הוּ <WH8414> for a thing of nought צַדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> the just ס

לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> concerning בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> concerning the house יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who פָּדָ֖ה <WH6299> who redeemed אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> Abraham לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor עַתָּ֤ה <WH6258> now יֵבוֹשׁ֙ <WH954> shall not now be ashamed יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> Jacob וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> now פָּנָ֥יו <WH6440> neither shall his face יֶחֱוָֽרוּ׃ <WH2357> now wax pale

כִּ֣י <WH3588> when בִ֠רְאֹתוֹ <WH7200> But when he seeth יְלָדָ֞יו <WH3206> his children מַעֲשֵׂ֥ה <WH4639> the work יָדַ֛י <WH3027> of mine hands בְּקִרְבּ֖וֹ <WH7130> in the midst יַקְדִּ֣ישֽׁוּ <WH6942> of him they shall sanctify שְׁמִ֑י <WH8034> my name וְהִקְדִּ֙ישׁוּ֙ <WH6942> and sanctify אֶת־ <WH853> קְד֣וֹשׁ <WH6918> the Holy One יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel יַעֲרִֽיצוּ׃ <WH6206> and shall fear

וְיָדְע֥וּ <WH3045> shall come תֹֽעֵי־ <WH8582> They also that erred ר֖וּחַ <WH7307> in spirit בִּינָ֑ה <WH998> to understanding וְרוֹגְנִ֖ים <WH7279> and they that murmured יִלְמְדוּ־ <WH3925> shall learn לֶֽקַח׃ <WH3948> doctrine
